spells.html_content:
Spells

Tactical Beacon
/ Recall Beacon
1 - 6 Range / 1AP

Summons a Tactical Beacon that can serve as an obstacle and target.
It takes half as much damage from allies, and it is immune to damage from Cra spells that require a target.

There can only be one Tactical Beacon per team. If the Tactical Beacon is still on the field when summoned again, the old one is destroyed to make room for the new one.
Required level: :
25|92|159

Normal effects

Summons Tactical Beacon

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Uses per turn
1
Modifiable range
Yes
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
No

details.name: Tactical Beacon
details.description:
Summons a Tactical Beacon that can serve as an obstacle and target.
It takes half as much damage from allies, and it is immune to damage from Cra spells that require a target.

There can only be one Tactical Beacon per team. If the Tactical Beacon is still on the field when summoned again, the old one is destroyed to make room for the new one.

Punitive Arrow
/ Arrow of Judgement
4 - 8 Range / 4AP

Inflicts Earth damage and applies the Punitive state on the caster.
The spell's damage is increased for one turn on the second turn after being cast, and again on the fourth turn after being cast.

The delay on the bonus does not apply if the caster is in the Punitive state.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Eye for Eye
/ Lark Mirror
5 Range / 2AP

Steals Range from enemies and applies the Eye for Eye state on the target:
• If the target is an enemy, repels the target if attacking the caster.
• If the target is an ally, repels the target's enemy attackers.
Entities that attack the targeted enemy or the targeted ally's attackers are healed for some of the damage inflicted.

The state cannot be unbewitched.
Required level: :
70|137

Normal effects

Steals 2 Range (2 turns)
'Eye for Eye' state (2 turns)
Pushes back 2 cell(s)
Heals the attacker by 20% of damage suffered

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Recast interval
4
Modifiable range
Yes
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes

details.name: Eye for Eye
details.description:
Steals Range from enemies and applies the Eye for Eye state on the target:
• If the target is an enemy, repels the target if attacking the caster.
• If the target is an ally, repels the target's enemy attackers.
Entities that attack the targeted enemy or the targeted ally's attackers are healed for some of the damage inflicted.

The state cannot be unbewitched.

effects.title: Heals the attacker by 20% of damage suffered

details.name: Recall Beacon
details.description:
Summons a Recall Beacon that switches places with the caster and heals them on the following turn.
It is also destroyed on the following turn.

The Beacon is immune to damage from Cra spells that require a target.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Lark Mirror
/ Eye for Eye
1 - 6 Range / 1AP

Summons a Lark Mirror that can serve as an obstacle and target.
If the beacon suffers damage, it attracts entities in a 3-cell cross and in a 2-cell diagonal cross around it.

The Lark Mirror reduces immediate allied damage by 80%.

There can only be one Lark Mirror per team. If the Lark Mirror is still on the field when summoned again, the old one is destroyed to make room for the new one.
Required level: :
180

Normal effects

Summons Lark Mirror
Attracts 2 cell(s)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Recast interval
2

Yes

/ Persecuting Arrow

On the targeted enemy for 2 turns:

• Inflicts Air damage if they are pushed or attracted.
Each element's damage can be triggered a maximum of 3 times per turn.
